price: Na hakika tumeisahilisha Qur'ani kuikumbuka. Lakini yupo anaye kumbuka?
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ يَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ
footnotes: Na hakika tumeifanya Qur'ani ni sahali kwa ajili ya mawaidha na mazingatio. Je! Yupo anaye waidhika?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walaqad yassarnā al-qur'āna lildhik'ri fahal min muddakirin
